name: 2-4x Variable Optic
desc: Variable weapon scope that allows user to switch between 2x and 4x magnifications

name: 4x Optic Sight
desc: Weapon scope providing 4x magnification

name: 6x Optic Sight
desc: Weapon scope providing 6x magnification
effect: 6x Magnification. Visible scope glint when aiming

name: 8x Optic Sight
desc: Weapon scope providing 8x magnification
effect: 8x Magnification. Visible scope glint when aiming

name: Audio Decoy
desc: The audio decoy is an Uncommon consumable that emits fake gunshots when thrown. It is useful to distract Creatures or other Prospectors. It is available to Print without unlocking anything.

name: Combat Medkit
desc: The Combat Medkit is available to Print without unlocking anything or purchased from the Osiris faction armory after completing the appropriate mission, and is recommendable over the Weak Medkit and Strong Medkit for various reasons as long as you have the budget. With a base health gain of 100, it can fully restore a prospector's health with only one use, though the use time is much longer than using a stim. Having a combat medkit can greatly affect a Prospector's odds of survival on Fortuna III.

name: Combat Stim
desc: The Combat Stim is available to Print without unlocking anything or purchased from the Osiris faction armory after completing the appropriate Mission. Purchasing or printing combat stims will yield a stack of x5 stims in a single transaction. It is the most expensive stim available in the game, but offers the best healing option during engagements. With a base health gain of 30, it can quickly restore a prospector's health with only a few uses.

name: Reinforced Helmet
desc: The Reinforced Helmet is a epic piece of Armor providing prospectors with 25 Armor with has 800 Durability.

name: Reinforced Shield
desc: The Reinforced Shield is a epic piece of Armor providing prospectors with 25 Armor and has 800 Durability

name: Enhanced Helmet
desc: The Enhanced Helmet is an exotic piece of Armor providing prospectors with 30 Armor and has 900 Durability

name: Enhacned Shield
desc: The Enhanced Shield is a exotic piece of Armor providing prospectors with 30 Armor and has 900 Durability.

name: Gas Grenade
desc: The gas grenade is an Uncommon Consumable that emits a damaging cloud of gas. It is useful to kill Creatures or other Prospectors. It is available to Print after completing the appropriate osiris mission.

name: Heavy Converter
desc: Increases weapon penetration against Armor for weapons using Heavy Ammo

name: Heavy Duty Backpack
desc: An extra large backpack for storing items.

name: Heavy Extended
desc: Increases magazine ammo capacity for weapons using Heavy Ammo

name: Heavy Quickdraw
desc: Reduces time needed to reload for weapons using Heavy Ammo

name: Holographic Sight
desc: Holographic sight with no magnification

name: Karma-1
desc: While heavy and requiring a charge-up to fire, a direct hit from the KARMA-1 will cripple if not outright kill any target, and the raw kinetic power will damage anything near the impact area.

name: Komrad
desc: This fearsome weapon platform is capable of firing salvos of fast-moving missiles capable of making short work of any hostile element.

name: Large Backpack
desc: A large backpack for storing items.

name: Laser Drill Beacon
desc: A powerful locator that can be used to call down an Korolev Laser Drill Platform on Extreme Letium Veins.

name: NV Helmet
desc: The NV Helmet is a legendary piece of Armor providing players with 33 Armor and Toggleable Night Vision while having 1000 Durability

name: Light Converter
desc: Increases weapon penetration against Armor for weapons using Light Ammo

name: Light Creature Dmg
desc: Increases weapon damage against Creatures for weapons using Light Ammo

name: Light Extended Quickdraw
desc: Increases magazine ammo capacity & reload speed for weapons using Light Ammo

name: Light Extended
desc: Increases magazine ammo capacity for weapons using Light Ammo

name: Light Quickdraw
desc: Reduces time needed to reload for weapons using Light Ammo

name: Medium Backpack
desc: A medium backpack for storing items.

name: Medium Converter
desc: Increases weapon penetration against Armor for weapons using Medium Ammo

name: Medium Creature Dmg
desc: Increases weapon damage against Creatures for weapons using Medium Ammo

name: Medium Extended Quickdraw
desc: Increases magazine ammo capacity & reload speed for weapons using Medium Ammo

name: Medium Extended
desc: Increases magazine ammo capacity for weapons using Medium Ammo

name: Medium Quickdraw
desc: Reduces time needed to reload for weapons using Medium Ammo

name: Medium Suppressor
desc: Muffles weapon sound when firing for Shotguns, ARs, and DMRs

name: MKM Ultralight Stock
desc: Reduces time to equip and aim for DMRs and Snipers

name: Oil Pump Beacon
desc: A powerful locator that can be used to call down an ICA NiC pump and refiner on an oil deposit.

name: Combat Helmet
desc: The Combat Helmet is a rare piece of Armor providing prospectors with 20 Armor and has 700 Durability

name: Combat Restoration Helmet
desc: The Combat Restoration Helmet is a rare piece of Armor providing prospectors with 25 Armor and 0.2HP Per Second while having 700 Durability

name: Combat Restoration Shield
desc: The Combat Restoration Shield is a rare piece of Armor providing prospectors with 25 Armor and 0.3HP Per Second while having 700 Durability

name: Combat Shield
desc: The Combat Shield is a rare piece of Armor providing prospectors with 20 Armor and has 700 Durability

name: Combat Tactical Helmet
desc: The Combat Tactical Helmet is a rare piece of Armor providing prospectors with 20 Armor and +20 Stamina while having 700 Durability

name: Combat Tactical Shield
desc: The Combat Tactical Shield is a rare piece of Armor providing prospectors with 20 Armor and +30 Stamina while having 700 Durability

name: Shotgun Converter
desc: Increases weapon penetration against Armor for weapons using Shotgun Ammo

name: Shotgun Extended
desc: Increases magazine ammo capacity for weapons using Shotgun Ammo

name: Shotgun Quickdraw
desc: Reduces time needed to reload for weapons using Shotgun Ammo

name: Small Suppressor
desc: Muffles weapon sound when firing for Pistols and SMGs

name: Strong Medkit
desc: The Strong Medkit is available to Print without unlocking anything or purchased from the Osiris faction armory after completing the appropriate mission, and is recommendable over the Weak Medkit for various reasons as long as you have the budget. With a base health gain of 100, it can fully restore a prospector's health with only one use, though the use time is much longer than using a stim. This means they are worth buying only if you do not have access to the Combat Medkit. Having a strong medkit can greatly affect a Prospector's odds of survival on Fortuna III.

name: Strong Stim
desc: The Strong Stim is available to Print without unlocking anything or purchased from the Osiris faction armory after completing the appropriate mission. Purchasing or printing strong stims will yield a stack of x5 stims. With a base health gain of 25, it can quickly restore a prospector's health with only a few uses.

name: Tactical Fore Grip
desc: Reduces the time to aim down sight for any weapon

name: Ultralight Stock
desc: Reduces time to equip and aim down the sight for Shotguns, SMGs, ARs and LMGs

name: Standard Helmet
desc: The Standard Helmet is a uncommon piece of Armor providing prospectors with 15 Armor and has 600 Durability

name: Standard Restoration Helmet
desc: The Standard Restoration Helmet is a uncommon piece of Armor providing prospectors with 15 Armor and +0.1HP Per Second while having 600 Durability

name: Standard Restoration Shield
desc: The Standard Restoration Shield is a uncommon piece of Armor providing prospectors with 15 Armor and +0.2HP Per Second while having 600 Durability

name: Standard Shield
desc: The Standard Shield is a piece of uncommon Armor providing prospectors with 15 Armor and has 600 Durability

name: Standard Tactical Helmet
desc: The Standard Tactical Helmet is a uncommon piece of Armor providing prospectors with 15 Armor and +15 Stamina while having 600 Durability

name: Standard Tactical Shield
desc: The Standard Tactical Shield is a uncommon piece of Armor providing prospectors with 15 Armor and +25 Stamina while having 600 Durability

name: Zeus Beam
desc: Called "Zeus" for turning any mortal into the God of Lightning, this heavy weapon will fulminate any creature that meets your divine ire.

name: Orbital Cannon Beacon
desc: Used for opening the Elite Crusher Caverns, highly charged Osiris lasers gets fired at the location of this beacon

name: Derelict Explosives
desc: Fortuna IIIs settlers took to using explosives to both mold the environment to their liking and get rid of the local pests. Can still be sold on the station, for fireworks of course.

name: Print Resin
desc: Can be loaded into most printers to print the base components of almost anything, from rubber ducks to weapon parts.

name: Autoloader
desc: Used for printing a variety of equipment requiring regular charges such as weapons. It can typically be found in high or extreme danger area's.

name: Master Unit CPU
desc: An advanced CPU, ideal for the running adaptive AI systems or the manipulation of complex energy fields.

name: Portable Lab
desc: A full lab in a box, also contains all sorts of specialized equipment and materials that can be repurposed. Loaded with delicate tools, sensitive software, and no manual.

name: Altered Nickel
desc: Found in various mineral veins pushed to the surface by the same process that spawns veltecite, this material is still worth selling at the station.

name: Light Grenade
desc: The Light Grenade is an uncommon consumable available only by crafting, in the Supply Crate or from missions as a reward. Throwing the Light Grenade deals damage within the explosion radius after a short period of time.

name: Cloudy Veltecite
desc: Shards of Cloudy Veltecite are often used for enery storage and generation. Korolev are always looking for any that prospectors can mine.

name: Clear Veltecite
desc: A rare shard of clear Veltecite. Korolev will pay a decent bit of pocket money for any that prospectors uncover with their pickaxe

name: Titan Ore
desc: Found in various mineral veins pushed to the surface by the same process that spawns Nickel.

name: Pure Focus Crystal
desc: Growths of these crystals are common on Fortuna III, valuable on the station for where they're often used in the creation of miniature figures.

name: Pure Veltecite
desc: Very rare shard of pure Veltecite torn out of a mineral vein, highly valued by Korolev and others.

name: Standard Grenade
desc: The Standard Grenade is an rare consumable available only by crafting, in the Supply Crate or from missions as a reward. Throwing the Standard Grenade deals damage within the explosion radius after a short period of time.

name: Assault Grenade
desc: The Assault Grenade is an exotic consumable available only by crafting, or from missions as a reward. Throwing the Assault Grenade deals damage within the explosion radius after a short period of time.

name: Reinforced Restoration Helmet
desc: The Reinforced Restoration Helmet is a epic piece of Armor providing prospectors with 25 Armor and +0.2HP Per Second while having 800 Durability

name: Reinforced Restoration Shield
desc: The Reinforced Restoration Shield is a epic piece of Armor providing prospectors with 25 Armor and +0.3HP Per Second while having 800 Durability

name: Reinforced Tactical Helmet
desc: The Reinforced Tactical Helmet is a epic piece of Armor providing prospectors with 25 Armor and +20 Stamina while having 800 Durability

name: Reinforced Tactical Shield
desc: The Reinforced Tactical Shield is a epic piece of Armor providing prospectors with 25 Armor and +30 Stamina while having 800 Durability

name: Enhanced Restoration Helmet
desc: The Enhanced Restoration Helmet is a exotic piece of Armor providing prospectors with 30 Armor and +0.3HP Per Second while having 900 Durability

name: Enhanced Restoration Shield
desc: The Enhanced Restoration Shield is a exotic piece of Armor providing prospectors with 30 Armor and +0.4HP Per Second while having 900 Durability

name: Enhanced Tactical Helmet
desc: The Enhanced Tactical Helmet is a exotic piece of Armor providing prospectors with 30 Armor and +25 Stamina while having 900 Durability

name: Enhanced Tactical Shield
desc: The Enhanced Tactical Shield is a exotic piece of Armor providing prospectors with 30 Armor and +35 Stamina while having 900 Durability

name: Howler Grenade
desc: A thrown device, developed by Osiris, that detonates after a short delay and disorients and slows targets in a radius.
